My first experience with Kimchi was when I was stationed at Ft. Bragg, NC. I was living in a barracks room, sharing a kitchen with a suite mate who was Korean. One day I opened the refrigerator and instantly smelled something rotten. I looked all over but I could not figure out what had gone bad. Later on I asked my suite mate and he told me that it was probably the Kimchi. I was very surprised. Who would ever eat rotten cabbage? I'm sorry but, yuck!
